Max Clifford , the well-known public relations guru who reportedly received a lucrative settlement when his phones were tapped, said that Edmonson's firing and Andy Coulson 's resignation was like a volcano that is starting to erupt. ''There will be huge explosions all over Fleet Street if police get to the truth,'' he told the BBC.

Linas Kleiza scored a career-high 41 points and grabbed nine rebounds as the Denver Nuggets beat the Utah Jazz 120-109 on Thursday night. I've now scored 40 points on the highest stage you can ever score, said Linas Kleiza , whose previous career-high of 29 came March 15 against the Los Angeles Lakers. '' The congressman's future has been the subject of speculation since he resigned the No. 3 GOP House leadership slot after winning a sixth term in November. Mike Pence , who often describes himself as a Christian, a conservative, and a Republican, in that order, is one of the party's most vocal critics of Barack Obama . , Eric Schmidt drew fire for responding to a hypothetical question posed at a forum in Washington, D.C., about a implant that could tell Google Inc. what its users were thinking. Jefferies feels that the move by Google to switch Eric Schmidt to Executive Chairman for CEO could not have come at a better time with such a strong last quarter. They are a little skeptic and state that, it does introduce a level of uncertainty around execution under the new leadership, particularly considering the growing competitive landscape.
